players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, not Charlie! Who could have done this?"
Bob: "It's tragic, but we must focus. Diana, what are your thoughts so far?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso; I investigated her last night. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "You're lying, Alice. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's the mafioso. We need to vote Bob out immediately."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until Diana accused me to reveal your investigation? Diana, if you investigated me, why didn't you say anything until after Alice spoke?"
You: "I revealed my investigation immediately because the town needs to know the truth fast. Diana's sudden accusation after mine is a clear lie to deflect. She's the mafioso—vote her out!"
